description: Discover and map React components across your codebase to clarify architecture. Identify refactor hotspots and complex components to prioritize improvements. Inspect props, hooks, structure, and relationships to guide safer refactors.

capabilities.name: compo_analyze
capabilities.description: Show props, hooks, structure and children for a single component

capabilities.name: compo_map
capabilities.description: List all components grouped by role with refactor hotspots

capabilities.name: compo_tree
capabilities.description: Show parents and children for a component (one level up and down)
